sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Forms gather and display input from users.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"guidelines"}}>{`Guidelines:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Forms may autosave or require a submit event depending on context and the type of input.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Inputs should include:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`A brief and descriptive labels`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`'(Optional)' after the label iif the field is optional`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`A character count if there is a limit`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`An indication of output value if the input is a slider`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`A placeholder that shows the user what an acceptable value looks like (except for passwords or any private information)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Inline validation and an appropriate error message if the input must match a specific pattern`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Helper text, if the reason for the input is not immediately obvious`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Distinct visual indications for blurred, focused, error, and read-only states`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
MDXContent.isMDXComponent = true
